channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road flooded caused by brook being blocked, 16th April
item.description:
The brook should drain away down to the canal but doesnâ€™t - the brook is blocked somewhere resulting in sustained closure of Blacksmiths Lane unnecessarily.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blacksmith Lane, Leigh, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 16th April
item.description:
There are a number of potholes here. You have highlighted one with white paint- but when you visited the bins were out - which would have covered them. Please check again - there are lots of patches/holes where the tarmac is breaking up and one that is quite big. It would be good if you can sort this out. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Larkhay Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This is a new report which has grown in size and depth since the recent visit by the Highways inspector., 16th April
item.description:
Between Cottage on the Green and Brook Cottage

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: The green right hand filter on the right hand turn is only applying on every third sequence causing major traffic backup on park road and further, 16th April
item.description:
Junction of Moorend park road and shurdington road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Moorend Park Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Public trees overhanging back garden, 16th April
item.description:
Hello, there are a few trees overhanging our back garden from the public footpath along side our house. We have contacted Cheltenham borougg council who have advised these are property of Gloucester city council. They filled our garden with leaves and have caused a significant amount of flys to be pestering the garden. Please can these be cut back to stop the overhang into our garden. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Dewberry Close, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There are a collection of dangerous pot holes on the traffic lights where you turn left onto Hucclecote Rd then onto Ermin Street from the Brockworth Bypass, 16th April
item.description:
Off the Brockworth Bypass & if you are turning left to go down Hucclecote Road which then leads on to Ermin Street

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large dead trees lining the brook have fallen on to fencing and across the brook. They will block the water flow soon as they are completely collapsing., 16th April
item.description:
Behind Denley Hall on Churchfields road and behind 1 Fieldgate road. In between these 2 properties in the brook.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Churchfields, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
